value:
Are you going to summon some
Heroes? Bring lots of cuties back with
you! You can do it—I know you can!

I was raised in the Deeprealms, but I
wanted to fight beside my dad, so I
ended up leading my own band!

Looks like the Order of Heroes keeps
you pretty busy. Don't work too hard!
I want to see you keep on smiling.

Why don't we go and get a cup of tea
sometime? I have a lot to thank you
for, and I know we'll have some fun.

You saw me? Oh, no! I was working
on my dancing. Problem is, I'm
nowhere near as good as my dad.

Wow! You've got a lot of cuties here...
Hi from $Nf!

Look how tough I am! See?
See?!

Oooh, I'm getting cuter by the
day!
Ugh! So embarrassing.

I'm stronger than ever? And
cooler, too? Well, thank you!

It's good to meet you! I'm Soleil. My
father's name is Laslow. I'll fight
hard for all the cuties out there!

There you are! Thanks for always
taking the time to chat with me.
What do you say to a date this time?$k$pHah! I'm just kidding. I know you're
way too busy with your Order of
Heroes business.$k$pIt's a bit embarrassing to put it into
words, but watching you work so hard
is a real pleasure.$k$pMaybe that sounded a little forward...
I just think you look cool when you
work so hard to help everybody.$k$pYou're kind of like a coolness role
model for me, so keep it up!$k$pBut if you ever want to let me have
you all to myself, let me know. I'll
scout out a great café just for us!
えいっ！
それっ！
ひゃあ！
You've done it now?!
Dance for me!
Smile, you're dead!
Scared yet?
This is gonna be cool!
So...not...cute.
Heehee
Seen any cute girls?
Turn that frown upside down! That's what my dad always says.
Once this mission is over, let's go get some tea. What do you say?
It's so hot out! I'm gonna change out of this— What do you mean, I can't change here?
You should take off that hood! It hides your face, cutie!
We need a plan for when the women here tell my Dad to get lost.
Leave the fighting to me! I'll dash out in front and protect you! I'll look SO cool!
Cool!
Soleil is here!
Wanna grab tea?
